General.Name: Coxon Precise Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Coxon Precise Industrial Co., Ltd manufactures and sells engineering plastic products in Taiwan. It is involved in the designing, mold manufacturing, injection molding, coating and printing, assembling, and optical lens processing activities. Coxon Precise Industrial Co., Ltd was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 48, Zhongzheng Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 320
